passive_voice1.question: Frank Robinson gave the name Coca Cola to the drink.-> The name Coca Cola .................... to the drink by Frank Robinson.
People eat thirty-five million hamburgers every day.     ->Thirty-five million hamburgers .....................every day.
Previously women thought tobacco smelly.     -> Tobacco ........................... smelly by women.
Industrial revolution helped to develop new technologies.     -> New technologies ............................... to develop by industrial revolution.
Most young people like chewing gum.     -> Chewing gum ......................... by most young people.
Where did they invent gun-powder?     -> Where .......................... gun-powder invented?
How do you make this delicious meal?     -> How ..................................this delicious meal made?
Why does he water these plants so rarely?     -> Why .................................. so rarely?
Producers sell about 1.2 billion gallons of Sprite every day.     -> About 1.2 billion gallons of Sprite ...................... every day.
The police didn't find the missing girl last weekend.     -> The missing girl .......................... last week by the police

passive_voice2.question: A passer-by caught the shoplifter and took him to the local police station.     -> The shoplifter .................... by a passer-by and taken to the local police station.
The hotel management requests the guests to leave the rooms by midday.     -> The guests ....................... to leave the rooms by midday.
Where did they hide all the sports equipment?     -> Where ......................... all the sports equipment hidden?
Tourists don't visit this museum very often.     -> This museum ......................... very often by tourists.
How often does he re-install his computer?How often is his computer.........................?
In the first stage of the process they roast and grind coffee beans.     -> Coffee beans ........................ in the first stage of the process.
The Polish archaeologists were the first to excavate and describe this temple.     -> This temple ....................... by the Polish archaeologists.
The professor reminded the students about the due-date for handing essays.     -> The students ....................... about the due-date for handing essays.
People speak English all over the world.     -> English ........................... all over the world.
They do not permit smoking in the auditorium.     -> Smoking ........................... in auditorium.

passive_voice3.question: Did they deliver your goods safely?     -> Were your goods ................ safely?
People didn't forget his brave deeds.     -> His brave deeds ..................... forgotten.
I could see nobody slept in this bed last night.     -> This bed ........................ in last night.
Did you hear that robbers broke into their house last weekend?     -> Did you hear that their house ..................... into last weekend?
Fortunately, they didn't pull down this old theatre.     -> Fortunately, this old theatre ...................... down.
Everybody knows it now that the Earth goes round the Sun.     -> It ............................ by everybody that Earth goes round the Sun.
When did Mr Ramsey translate this book into English?     -> When ......................... into English by Mr Ramsay?
The government lifted some of the restrictions last year.     -> Some of the restrictions ........................ by the government last year.
People in our country know Mrs J.K.Rowling's books very well.     -> Mrs J.K.Rowling's books ................. in our country.
They allow the pupils to speak their language only during Polish lessons.     -> The pupils ....................... to speak their language only during Polish lessons.

passive_voice4.question: They never help their mother with the housework.     -> Their mother ...................... with the housework.
The Robinsons keep their huge Rottweiler dogs in the garden.     -> Huge Rottweiler dogs............................ by the Robinsons in the garden.
Who won this match?     -> Who ...................... this match won by?
This company sell their products all over the world.     -> This company's products ........................ all over the world.
A Dutch scientist built the first pendulum clocks in 1656.     -> The first pendulum clocks ....................... in 1656 by a Dutch scientist.
Maintenance engineers check regularly all the equipments.     -> All the equipments .................. regularly by maintenance engineers.
They awarded Mother Teresa the Nobel Peace Prize in 1979.     -> Mother Teresa ................. the Nobel Peace Prize in 1979.
Women fans send thousands of letters to Antonio Banderas every month.     -> Thousands of letters ................ to Antonio Banderas every month.
His elder brother taught him how to ride a bike.     -> He ............................ how to ride a bike by his elder brother.
The mechanic didn't repair my car on time.     -> My car ....................... on time by the mechanic.
